name: Seedcity Chasers
description:
Seedcity Chasers!

Shmup Endless Runner in a Cyberpunk city with pandas.

Instructions:

TAB - switch control schemes

Up/Right/Down/Left Arrows - Move

Z - Button A - Basic attack

X - Button B - Pickup traps  / Special attack

A - Start Button

Or

WASD - Move

J - Button A - Basic attack

K - Button B - Pickup traps  / Special attack

Return - Start button

Programming:

Ariel Coppes - @arielsan

Art:

Nicolás de León - @ndele0n

Franco Zucchi - @pencilwing

Music & SFX:

Martín García de Zúñiga - @elementalbucle

Seedcity Chasers was made to participate at  the GBJAM10.
